title: Club member 50 max
body: Hey, I am currently managing a club for the town I live in. It is full.. 50 members. I was wondering if you guys had any plans on making the club member limit higher?

replies.body:
Hey there,

My understanding is the current system for clubs is in no shape to support more than 50 members per club.

It's possible after LCU we may see some improvements to the club system, however I do not speak for Riot nor do I know anything about their plans after LCU.
